attributes.action: Persuade and convince Parliament to repeal two laws/acts for any they introduce or modify.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The (GB+) legal system needs simplification. 
Rather than have an ever growing proliferation of laws ("an extravagance"?), 
 the legal corpus should be shortened, simplified, better crafted, and be made more intelligible and accessible.

That's unlikely to happen unless Parliament fixes the existing "mutation" without complicating it more.

Forcibly reducing the size of the legal corpus by requiring that existing statutes be trimmed -- before modification or introducing new ones -- should go some way in fostering the necessary simplification.
